name: SANTAGO!
description:
DESCRIPTION

Santago is a pixel art adventure game. In the game you are a Santa, on the way to sent the Christmas gifts you fell in a castle. Your buddy reindeer has been caught as well. You have to complete 10 different levels, avoid every monsters in the castle, and collect all the gifts to rescue your reindeer.

FEATURES

10 different levels of pixel art

An active soundtrack

Funny monster

Collect all the gifts

Rescue your reindeer


KEYBOARD

LEFT : GO LEFT

RIGHT : GO RIGHT

SPACE : JUMP

CONTACT

EMAIL : 542706957@qq.com
